EmailTemplate.name: Failed-PID
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Recent Application with ICCU
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued Member,
Thank you for your online application for membership at Idaho Central Credit Union. Unfortunately we were unable to verify your identity on the application. To continue with your application, please go into one of our branch locations with a valid form of photo identification. If you have questions, please feel free to contact us at 1-800-456-5067 using reference number <CollabJob>.
Thank you,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
Idaho Central Credit Union
P.O. Box 2469
Pocatello, ID 83206
d: (208) 239-3000 | f: (208) 239-3055
